duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for opening and managing the Reno, NV office, including procurement of office resources and operations management.
Interaction with local customers and clients, oversight of mechanical contracts, and working on current and upcoming projects with business partners.
Running contractor bids and overseeing project-related work.
Interacting with existing and prospective clients and customers.
Self-motivated individual who can successfully operate with little-to-no supervision.
Managing permitting and inspection experience and holding a PMP or PE license.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related engineering degree (Master's preferred)
